lead_paragraph: A survey by PEN America shows growing difficulties in getting news out of the country as its economic importance and geopolitical power grow.

headline.print_headline: China Working to Keep Foreign Reporters on a Short Leash, Report Says
headline.main: Foreign Reporters in China Face More Restrictions Now, Report Says

snippet: A survey by PEN America shows growing difficulties in getting news out of the country as its economic importance and geopolitical power grow....
abstract: Report from writers group PEN America concludes foreign journalists in China are under so many more restrictions under Pres Xi Jinping's leadership it is causing foreign media organizations to compromise editorial standards in order to do business there; report details concerns and is scheduled to be formally presented at Overseas Press Club in New York.
